Complete episodes as of February 3, 2013, 1-131 episodes for $20. Total of 10-11 CDs. Fully subbed. Anyone interested?

This is amazing, just shows the love for Running man all over the world.
For those wondering, this is a variety show from korea with the spoken language being korean with english subtitles. The subs are fantastic up to ep 100, and decent after (but still good). The quality of this show, and the 720p makes it a fantastic show to watch. Definite download. I have already uploaded 120 gb, so keep seeding with me you guys. THIS TORRENT SHOULD NEVER DIE!
Hi @rmvids - I'm interested.  How should we do this?... I'm in Hong Kong though, by the ways.  Thanks!

South Korea has the best variety shows.  I wish the broadcast companies would release DVDs with subtitles so we wouldn't have such a hard time finding theses shows online.  I would LOVE to have all Family Outing season 1 episodes in decent quality.  But alas, it was never meant to be. :(  Running Man, FIGHTING!
